name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: quickprompt - Prompt Manager for ChatGPT and Claude

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly save, organize, and reuse your favorite prompts for faster and smarter conversations.

quickprompt saves you time from switching tabs and having to copy and paste your most used prompts.

With quickprompt, you can access your prompts straight from within ChatGPT by typing "/" in the input field. Continue typing to filter out your prompts or use your keyboard's arrow keys to navigate. Press the "Tab" key to quickly insert your prompt into the input field and you're done!

Features:
- Save unlimited prompts*
- Organize prompts into folders*
- Privacy focused, all your data is stored on your local machine üîí
- Light & dark mode ‚òÄÔ∏èüåô
- Quick access to saved prompts in ChatGPT ‚ö°
- Quick access to saved prompts in Claude (beta)
- Backup and restore saved prompts*
- Save prompts from chats (Coming soon)*

* - Pro version required, free version is limited to 10 prompts
